item.title: PM Narendra Modis new decoy two routes a dummy convoy
item.description: With Prime Minister Narendra Modi facing increasing threats from terrorists his security detail has started earmarking two routes with two cavalcades simultaneously for his road travel
item.itunes:subtitle: With Prime Minister Narendra Modi facing increasing threats from terrorists his security detail has started earmarking two routes with two cavalcades simultaneously for his road travel
item.itunes:summary: With Prime Minister Narendra Modi facing increasing threats from terrorists his security detail has started earmarking two routes with two cavalcades simultaneously for his road travel

item.title: Speaker dampens Congs chances of bagging LoP post
item.description: Congress chances of bagging the coveted Leader of Oppositions post in Lok Sabha looks grim as Speaker Sumitra Mahajan said on Monday that she would follow the rules of the House
item.itunes:subtitle: Congress chances of bagging the coveted Leader of Oppositions post in Lok Sabha looks grim as Speaker Sumitra Mahajan said on Monday that she would follow the rules of the House
item.itunes:summary: Congress chances of bagging the coveted Leader of Oppositions post in Lok Sabha looks grim as Speaker Sumitra Mahajan said on Monday that she would follow the rules of the House

item.title: PM Modi wanted ties with Pakistan to be clearly demarcated
item.description: It was a myth that Prime Minister Narendra Modi was eager for a deep engagement with Pakistan He wanted a relationship but ones marked by clear red lines and with minimal leeway for Islamabad
item.itunes:subtitle: It was a myth that Prime Minister Narendra Modi was eager for a deep engagement with Pakistan He wanted a relationship but ones marked by clear red lines and with minimal leeway for Islamabad
item.itunes:summary: It was a myth that Prime Minister Narendra Modi was eager for a deep engagement with Pakistan He wanted a relationship but ones marked by clear red lines and with minimal leeway for Islamabad

item.title: Flagmeeting cancelled over LoC firing
item.description: Pakistan has again fired along the international border in Jammu district targeting a dozen forward posts of the Border Security Forcenbsp and injuring a villager Toughening its stand India has decided not to hold any flag meeting and respond in a tough manner
item.itunes:subtitle: Pakistan has again fired along the international border in Jammu district targeting a dozen forward posts of the Border Security Forcenbsp and injuring a villager Toughening its stand India has decided not to hold any flag meeting and respond in a tough m
item.itunes:summary: Pakistan has again fired along the international border in Jammu district targeting a dozen forward posts of the Border Security Forcenbsp and injuring a villager Toughening its stand India has decided not to hold any flag meeting and respond in a tough manner

item.title: Mundes daughter to go on Maharashtra tour before assembly polls
item.description: By approving Pankaja Mundes 3000km statewide Sangharsh Yatra ahead of the assembly elections the state unit of the BJP has finally anointed the 34yearold as late Gopinath Mundes political heir
item.itunes:subtitle: By approving Pankaja Mundes 3000km statewide Sangharsh Yatra ahead of the assembly elections the state unit of the BJP has finally anointed the 34yearold as late Gopinath Mundes political heir
item.itunes:summary: By approving Pankaja Mundes 3000km statewide Sangharsh Yatra ahead of the assembly elections the state unit of the BJP has finally anointed the 34yearold as late Gopinath Mundes political heir

item.title: Soon IITKGP to boast of a centre for promotion of human values
item.description: In a first IIT Kharagpur the oldest among all IITs will have a centre exclusively for promotion of human values through meditation yoga lectures on spiritualism and character building its director announced on Monday

item.title: Nitish Katara murder trial cost exchequer Rs 6cr
item.description: The murder trial in the sensational Nitish Katara murder case cost the exchequer nearly Rs 6 crore from the stage of investigation to sentencing says a firstofitskind report authored by the Delhi state legal services authority

item.title: Revealed how Modi decided to call off IndoPak meeting
item.description: The decision to call off foreign secretarylevel talks with Pakistan according to Indian diplomatic and intelligence sources was well thought out and taken by PM Narendra Modi Poll Can IndoPaknbspties ever improve

item.title: In Bengal BJP rallying Hindu refugees SCSTs against Bangla Muslim settlers
item.description: In the BJPs book there are two categories of Bangladeshis who have settled in West Bengal Hindu refugees fleeing religious persecution and Muslim infiltrators
item.itunes:subtitle: In the BJPs book there are two categories of Bangladeshis who have settled in West Bengal Hindu refugees fleeing religious persecution and Muslim infiltrators
item.itunes:summary: In the BJPs book there are two categories of Bangladeshis who have settled in West Bengal Hindu refugees fleeing religious persecution and Muslim infiltrators

item.title: Hyderabad comes to a grinding halt as Telangana govt survey kicks off
item.description: Transport services have been stopped offices education institutes closed and cinema theatres petrol stations shut down the Telangana government is making all efforts to make every one in the new states population is counted and their socioeconomic status profiled on Tuesday
item.itunes:subtitle: Transport services have been stopped offices education institutes closed and cinema theatres petrol stations shut down the Telangana government is making all efforts to make every one in the new states population is counted and their socioeconomic status
item.itunes:summary: Transport services have been stopped offices education institutes closed and cinema theatres petrol stations shut down the Telangana government is making all efforts to make every one in the new states population is counted and their socioeconomic status profiled on Tuesday

item.title: 1000odd Planning Commission staff at sea
item.description: Uncertainty mires not only the future of 1000 employees working with the Planning Commission and its affiliated institutions but also some constitutional tasks on interstate relations the panel used to perform

item.title: Mars mission Isro readies to lower spacecraft speed
item.description: As Dday approaches for Mangalyaans entry to Mars the Indian Space Research Organisation Isro is gearing up for its next big challenge lowering the velocity of the spacecraft
item.itunes:subtitle: As Dday approaches for Mangalyaans entry to Mars the Indian Space Research Organisation Isro is gearing up for its next big challenge lowering the velocity of the spacecraft
item.itunes:summary: As Dday approaches for Mangalyaans entry to Mars the Indian Space Research Organisation Isro is gearing up for its next big challenge lowering the velocity of the spacecraft

item.title: Sanjanas husband watched her burn and did nothing to save her
item.description: Sanjana had set herself on fire after enduring years of harassment at the hands of her inlaws Her husband saw her set herself on fire but did nothing to stop her and took her to the hospital only on the insistence of neighbours
item.itunes:subtitle: Sanjana had set herself on fire after enduring years of harassment at the hands of her inlaws Her husband saw her set herself on fire but did nothing to stop her and took her to the hospital only on the insistence of neighbours
item.itunes:summary: Sanjana had set herself on fire after enduring years of harassment at the hands of her inlaws Her husband saw her set herself on fire but did nothing to stop her and took her to the hospital only on the insistence of neighbours

item.title: Ghaziabad tense after minors rape auto drivers murder
item.description: The local administration was forced to call in paramilitary forces in Loni Monday as hundreds of protesters clashed with the police after rumours of an alleged rape victims death and the accused being let off spread in the UP town that borders Delhi

item.title: India Japan aim to iron out civil Ndeal wrinkles
item.description: With India showing willingness to sign the civil nuclear deal with Japan Tokyo is sending top diplomat Shinsuke Sugiyama to New Delhi next week for lastminute clarifications and negotiations with top officials including national security advisor Ajit Doval
item.itunes:subtitle: With India showing willingness to sign the civil nuclear deal with Japan Tokyo is sending top diplomat Shinsuke Sugiyama to New Delhi next week for lastminute clarifications and negotiations with top officials including national security advisor Ajit Dova
item.itunes:summary: With India showing willingness to sign the civil nuclear deal with Japan Tokyo is sending top diplomat Shinsuke Sugiyama to New Delhi next week for lastminute clarifications and negotiations with top officials including national security advisor Ajit Doval
